name: Wizard Wars (UltiGames)
description:
Gameplay

Wizard Wars is an FPS game with a magical twist. By using your "Magesight" ability, you can reveal parts of the arena that you can use your magic to transform into temporary platforms, granting you the ability to create platforms for movement or dynamic cover. As you fight Findrunkel, he will grow more desperate, calling upon even more powerful attacks to strike you down, such as teleporting around the battlefield or calling mighty armageddon from the sky.

Plot

You are a rookie Magehunter, a wizard who hunts down rogue magic users, in Wizard Wars - a magical FPS boss demo. Your enemy is Findrunkel, the Mad Mage, who will stop at nothing to see the world under his heel. And only you stand between him and his goal.

Controls

Wizard Wars uses Mouse and Keyboard inputs exclusively.

Movement [WASD]

Jump [SPACE]

Sprint [LSHIFT]

Firebolt [LEFT CLICK]

Transform [RIGHT CLICK]

Magesight [Q]
